examples.example: 我在生活中不断探索，终于发现了许多美好而有趣的事物。

translate.english: I continuously explore in life, and finally discover many wonderful and interesting things.

examples.example: 我在阅读书籍的过程中，惊喜地发现了许多宝贵的人生智慧。

translate.english: In the process of reading books, I was pleasantly surprised to discover many precious life wisdoms.

examples.example: 我在旅行中发现了世界的多姿多彩。

translate.english: I discovered the colorful world during the travel.
